Confess(ulong, string)

Allows users to confess anonymously.

Declaration
[Cmd("Confess")]
[Aliases("Confess")]
[RequireContext(ContextType.DM)]
public Task Confess(ulong serverId, string confession)
Parameters
Type Name Description
ulong serverId

The ID of the server.
string confession

The confession message
Returns
Type Description
Task
Examples

.confess 1234567890 falafel.

ConfessionLogChannel(ITextChannel?)

Sets the confession log channel for logging confessions. Misuse of this feature will end up in me being 2m away from your house.
